18.09.2006 SH SCR11912 Added test to stop BAD701 if no CLDC rows exists
-- If no CLDC row exists stop BAD701, no costs have to be charged
-- If no CLDC row exists stop BAD701, no costs have to be charged
(V.NOMA / D has not to be rounded by as usal, f.e. 5,1 should become 6 and
... expiry date increased and amount increased
... calc part for expiry date increased
... calculate SUM(LCHI_AMOUNTLC) uses in the following parts 1 / 2
... reset variables which are also used in part "A - LC opening commission"
... expiry date increased and amount increased

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(LCHI_AMOUNTLC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCHI where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE < 10 for fetch only
